trial_type.Description: Category of trial based on stimuli characteristics

total_stim_duration.Description: Duration of stimulus from beginning of word_A to the end of word_B

word_A.Description: The first word presented before the pause

word_A_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of word_A in the English Lexicon Project

word_A_ortho_neighbors.Description: Number of orthographic neighbors of word_A based on the English Lexicon Project

word_A_phono_neighbors.Description: Number of phonological neighbors of word_A based on the English Lexicon Project

word_A_semantic_neighbors.Description: Number of semantic neighbors of word_A based on the English Lexicon Project

word_A_phonotactic_probability_biphone.Description: Biphone probability for word_A based on the Phonotactic Probability Calculator

word_A_phonotactic_probability_phoneme.Description: Phoneme probability for word_A based on the Phonotactic Probability Calculator

pause_duration.Description: Duration of pause between word_A and word_B

word_B.Description: The second word presented after the pause

word_B_frequency.Description: HAL frequency of word_B in the English Lexicon Project

word_B_ortho_neighbors.Description: Number of orthographic neighbors of word_B based on the English Lexicon Project

word_B_phono_neighbors.Description: Number of phonological neighbors of word_B based on the English Lexicon Project

word_B_semantic_neighbors.Description: Number of semantic neighbors of word_B based on the English Lexicon Project

word_B_phonotactic_probability_biphone.Description: Biphone probability for word_B based on the Phonotactic Probability Calculator

word_B_phonotactic_probability_phoneme.Description: Phoneme probability for word_B based on the Phonotactic Probability Calculator

word_A_B_association_strength.LongName: First and Second words Association Strength
word_A_B_association_strength.Description: Strength of association between word_A and word_B based on the University of South Florida Free Association Norms
